propositions.text: The document is titled "偏偏娇纵".
A peculiar event happened in the past decade.
The narrator was on a train and looking at a photo on her phone.
The photo was of the narrator and her friend, whom she calls "Sister".
The narrator's friend asked if she wanted coffee.
The train stopped abruptly while they were talking.
The narrator couldn't pick up her phone.
The narrator's friend asked her to pick up her phone.
The narrator stated she couldn't pick up her phone.
The narrator's friend repeated the request to pick up her phone.
The narrator reiterated she couldn't pick up her phone.

concepts.name: 偏偏娇纵
concepts.context: Title of the document, Part 1, and Chapter 1.

concepts.name: phone
concepts.context: The narrator's phone, which fell and could not be picked up.

concepts.name: friend
concepts.context: The narrator's friend, referred to as "Sister", who is on the train with her.

concepts.name: train
concepts.context: The setting where the peculiar event occurs, involving abrupt stops and movement.

concepts.name: photo
concepts.context: A picture on the narrator's phone.

concepts.name: coffee
concepts.context: An offer made by the narrator's friend.

concepts.name: event
concepts.context: A peculiar occurrence described in the chapter.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured with a main title, followed by a numbered part, and within that, a numbered chapter. The chapter content describes a narrative sequence of events.
